banner.building: This page is still under construction

hero.title: Backend Developer (.NET) · DevOps-minded · Fullstack when needed
hero.description: Scalable and maintainable backend, focused on clear architecture and production-ready code. .NET, databases and robust APIs, designed for real-world environments. Full-stack development when architecture requires it. Code that works in production, not just locally.

stack.net8.title: .NET 8 (LTS)
body: Building APIs and services in .NET 8 LTS with focus on performance and maintainability.
Using Minimal APIs and ASP.NET Core for clean endpoints, validation, and middleware.
Deployments in containers and CI/CD pipelines for continuous delivery.

stack.csharp12.title: C# 12
body: Applying modern language features for expressive and safe code.
Design patterns and SOLID principles in backend solutions and internal libraries.

stack.sqlserver.title: SQL Server
body: Data modelling, optimised queries and indexes for consistent performance.
Controlled migrations and stored procedures when they add value.

stack.orm.title: EF Core / Dapper
body: EF Core for complex aggregates and change tracking; Dapper for high-performance queries.
Pragmatic choice based on use case and latency requirements.

stack.restapis.title: REST APIs
body: Stable contract design, versioning, pagination and consistent error handling.
Authentication and authorisation with JWT/claims and policies.

frontend.vue3.title: Vue 3
body: Reactive interfaces with Composition API and decoupled components.
Integration with backend APIs and well-defined loading/error states.

frontend.javascript.title: JavaScript
body: Clean code for client interactions and presentation logic.
Best practices in modularity and events.

frontend.typescript5.title: TypeScript 5
body: Strict types and shared contracts to reduce runtime errors.
DTOs and models aligned with the backend.

frontend.tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
body: Utility-first styles to build consistent and maintainable UI.
Responsive designs without complex CSS.

frontend.htmlcss.title: HTML / CSS
body: Semantic and accessible layouts, focused on readability and performance.
Style optimisation and loading.

infra.docker.title: Docker
body: Packaging .NET services and frontend in reproducible containers.
Image optimisation and multi-stage builds.

infra.gitci.title: Git & CI/CD
body: Workflows with clean branches, reviews and test automation.
Pipelines for build, test and automated deployment.

infra.cloudflare.title: Cloudflare
body: Static content delivery and DNS configuration, rules and caching.
Basic protections and edge performance.

infra.ghactions.title: GitHub Actions
body: Workflows to build and publish artefacts and containers.
Secret security and environment matrices.

infra.linux.title: Linux
body: Service operation, scripting and basic observability in Linux environments.
Diagnostics with logs and system metrics.

languages.csharp.title: C#
body: Primary language for backend with .NET, focus on clarity and testing.
Use of modern patterns and best practices.

languages.tsjs.title: TypeScript / JavaScript
body: UI development and tooling scripts; types for robustness and maintainability.

languages.sql.title: SQL
body: Queries, optimisations and index tuning for real-world cases.

languages.java.title: Java
body: Previous experience in service projects and utilities, focus on readability.

languages.c_cpp.title: C / C++
body: Low-level programming fundamentals and memory and performance understanding.

practices.cleancode.title: Clean Code
body: Clear names, small functions and well-defined responsibilities.

practices.architecture.title: Architecture
body: Modular design, layered separation and well-managed dependencies.

practices.apidesign.title: API Design
body: Stable contracts, versioning and resource and error conventions.

practices.testing.title: Testing
body: Unit tests for critical logic and integration tests for complete flows.
Test double strategies and representative test data.

practices.observability.title: Observability
body: Structured logging, metrics and traces for diagnostics and monitoring.
Minimal alerts and dashboards for system health.

errors.404: The requested resource could not be found on this server.
errors.500: Internal server error. Something went wrong on our end.
errors.403: Access to this resource is forbidden.
errors.401: Authentication is required to access this resource.
